emuInput.TitMainTitle: Daisy Lampkin standing with Alice Weston in Channel 11 studio for taping of "Luncheon at the Ones" program
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1962, pg. 2, reads: "Guest At Luncheon At Ones - Mrs. Daisy E. Lampkin, vice president of The Pittsburgh Courier, and four members of The Pittsburgh Courier staff were guests of 'Luncheon at the Ones,' Channel 11, on Jan. 22. Mrs. Lampkin is shown here with hostess Alice Weston, preceding the popular program which attracts thousands of viewers each day.  Mrs. Lampkin publicized the Courier Appreciation Rally which will take place at Soldiers and sailors Memorial Hall on Sunday, Feb. 25, at 3 P.M. - Harris Photo."
